content:
I'm glad you liked the idea of categorizing by occasion! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have the ability to keep track of your personal activities or remember specific details about your jewelry wear. I'm a text-based AI, I don't have access to your personal calendar, schedule, or daily activities.

If you want to keep track of when you wear specific jewelry pieces, you might consider keeping a jewelry journal or log. This can be a fun way to record when you wear certain pieces, what occasion you wore them for, and even how you styled them. You can also take photos of yourself wearing the jewelry to help you remember.

Alternatively, you could consider using a habit-tracking app or a digital notes app to keep track of your jewelry wear. This way, you can easily access and review your records whenever you want.

Remember, the most important thing is to have fun with your jewelry collection and enjoy wearing the pieces that make you feel confident and happy!
